alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 3:38PM EST until November 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lake County. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST this evening to 10 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, including along I-90. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow will begin to accumulate quickly after sunset. Snow will increase in intensity overnight with rates of one inch per hour at times. Snow will shift inland during the day Thursday, before the most organized snow bands lift north over Lake Erie by Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
